resources.string: Wordminded is a play on words for cheerful companies & family evenings.

The game "Wordminded" has two decks of cards of different colors: red and blue. Blue cards are categories that limit the search for the desired word. The deck is red - it shows letters that will help you find the right word, since they begin with these letters.
Any player starts the game. He clicks on the screen of the phone. 2 cards appear. Players try as quickly as possible to name a word that fits the open category and starts with an open letter.
